recipesJson.name: Apple Bottom
recipesJson.author: Kopel
recipesJson.description: Bright berries, with a sweet sweet apple base.

reviews.text: Saw it, read it, mixed it, shook it, vaped it... good simple recipe. I added my natural sweeteners at .6% for my sweet tooth. Ty!
Another excellent recipe kopel. Super simple & good to go after day steep
